Comment: The wonderful thing is that there's no recovering the cancerous government agencies he amputated. There's going to be 4 more years *minimum* before Democrats would even have a chance putting the federal bureaucracy back together, and even then, it's way harder to build things than to destroy them.  Can you imagine how demoralizing that must be if you're a leftist right now? Even if they somehow win in 2028, it'd take more than one term for them to put together what was destroyed. Then the next Republican president can just destroy the agencies all over again!
